column4: Question" why does network manager refuse to reconnect after waking out of standby?  (running Ac!D Linux, based on Ubuntu 8.04.3)
we don't support derivatives in here.. but I can say that it's been much improved in 9.10... works perfectly here
my advice remains the same.. upgrade to 9.10
8.04 might make sense on a server.. but not for desktop and especially not for laptops
